title: Beloved Omega And Noble Lion
alternative_title: A lion in love and an omega in a honey cage ; Beloved Omega and Noble Lion ; Henai Shishi to Mitsuai no Omega ; The Lion and the Omega in the Honey Cage ; 偏愛獅子と、蜜檻のオメガ
status: A lion in love and an omega in a honey cage ; Beloved Omega and Noble Lion ; Henai Shishi to Mitsuai no Omega ; The Lion and the Omega in the Honey Cage ; 偏愛獅子と、蜜檻のオメガ
description:
Description :
        The private Omori Academy attended by the elite beastman Alpha. Yu Otani, a hominin omega, was the only omega scholarship student at the school. - He was fitted with a chastity belt, and during estrus, he was directed to the desires of the alphas as a live bait for "estrus endurance training". In front of Yuyu, the head of the dormitory, Shio Mikimoto, a priest of the Lion Tribe, appeared and .......
